press.title: Press
press.contactLine: Para kareng media, kontakan yu kami keni
press.boilerplateBody: Ing Chatforia metung yang privacy‚Äëfirst a messaging app a pabyasa ya ing pamanyulam kareng amanu. Encrypted la king end‚Äëto‚Äëend deng mensahi, at atin yang built‚Äëin a translation para king 100+ amanu king real time. Malyari deng maglako a mensahi, optional deng read receipts, at maka‚Äësync la kareng device. Atin yang iOS, Android, at web.
press.scanTip: Keng desktop? I‚Äëscan me gamit telepunu para i‚Äëdownload ing app.

careers.title: Trabahu
careers.intro: Maliit kaming team a mag‚Äëobra king metung a privatung, global a messenger. Nung alangawa kayu king encryption, accessibility, at maligayang UX, misulat kayu keni.
careers.openRoles: Open a roles: Engineering (Full‚Äëstack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Makananu mag‚Äëapply: I‚Äëemail yu ing resume/links yu keni jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Patungkul king Chatforia
about.description: Ing Chatforia metung yang segurung, multilingual a messenger a atin end‚Äëto‚Äëend encryption, instant translation, at voice/vidyu calling. Ing misyun mi simple: pag‚Äëugnayan la deng tau‚Äîseguru, privadu, at akyap kareng pengauganan a amanu.

values.control: <bold>Kontrol:</bold> Maglako a mensahi at read receipts optional la.
values.access_aria: Access para kareng sabla: Auto‚Äëtranslate 100+ amanu.

about.howDescription: Keng device mu mismu mencrypt deng mensahi bago lulual. Ing translation, backups, at device sync mekadesenyu para pakunti la mu ing akit da reng servers mi.

advertise.title: Mag‚Äëadvertise kng Chatforia
advertise.description: Abutan deng gagamit ning mensahi kapamilatan deng malinis, brand‚Äësafe a puwesto. Atin kaming banner karing makasaup a lugar, sponsorships, at house promos. E makakita ads deng Premium subscribers.

adsense.withPubId: Magsilbi kami king Google AdSense. Nung buri yung i‚Äëtarget keni king Google Ads, gamitan yu ing publisher ID {{pubId}} at dumagul kayu para king managed placement kareng units king baba. Atin direct sponsorships‚Äîgamit ye ing porma.
adsense.noPubId: Magsilbi kami king Google AdSense. Atin mu naman direct sponsorships‚Äîgamit ye ing porma king baba.

advertise.noPlacements: Ala pang configured a placements. Dagdagan yu la kng ads/placements.js.

why.deals: Direct deals o programmatic kapamilatan AdSense/Google Ads

alert.text: Lumab√ª ya ing gabay a iti kabang mag‚Äëlunsad kami bayung features. Nung atin a kulang, sabian yu kami king

section2.title: 2) Umpisan ing pamag‚Äëmensahi

account.q: Makananu kung gawan o bawi√°n ing account ku?
account.a: I‚Äëdownload ye ing app o gamit ing web, pindutan ing ‚ÄúCreate account‚Äù, i‚Äëverify ing email/telepunu. Para bawi√°n, gamit ye ing ‚ÄúForgot password‚Äù.

privacy.q: Encrypted la ba deng mensahi king end‚Äëto‚Äëend?
privacy.a: O. Deng mensahi at tawag encrypted la king end‚Äëto‚Äëend. Ika mu at ing tatanggap mu ing makabasa.

translate.a: I‚Äëenable ye ing ‚ÄúAuto‚Äëtranslate‚Äù keni Settings ‚Üí Appearance & Language. On‚Äëdevice nung susuportan, aliwa naman kapamilatan kareng segurung API a atin mu maragul a metadata.

contact.a: I‚Äëemail yu kami keni support@chatforia.com. Isali yu deng screenshot at bersyun ning app yu.

contact.title: Kontakan Kami
contact.successMsg: Salamat‚Äîmag‚Äëreply ya ing team mi king email.
contact.errorSend: E meyari ing pamag‚Äëpadala. Mangyaring i‚Äëemail yu ing support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Ing Privacy Policy a iti mipaliwanag ya makananu mi kukulekta, gamit, at pamilian ing impormasyon nung gagamit kayu kareng apps at serbisyo mi. Pekadesenyo ya ing Chatforia ban pakanwan nala ing maragul a data a akit mi.

infoWeCollect.title: Impormasyun a kukulekta mi
infoWeCollect.account: Impormasyun ning account (hal., email/telepunu) para gawan at seguran ing account yu.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted a laman (mensahi/tawag) E2E la; ali mi la mabasa.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage anti la ring crash logs, klase ning device, o malating analytics para pakayapun ing performance.

howWeUse.title: Makananu mi gamit ing impormasyon
howWeUse.provide: Ibigay at seguran ing serbisyo (auth, spam/abuse detection).
howWeUse.improve: Pakamayap deng features (kaledad ning translation, kasalpantayanan).

sharing.title: Pamiyabe
sharing.body: Ali mi benta ing personal a data. Malyari ming iabe maragul a data kareng processors (hal., push notifications, analytics) king maragul a kontrata.

rights.title: Karapatan yu
rights.body: Agpang king lugar yu (hal., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), malyari kayung humiling access, koreksyun, pamag‚Äëbura, o mag‚Äëopt‚Äëout kareng alilang pamag‚Äëproseso. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Pamag‚Äësalikut & seguridad
retention.body: Salikut mu deng dapat para magobra ing serbisyo at gumamit kaming industry‚Äëstandard a seguridad. E2E a laman ali mi malako.

children.title: Anak
children.body: Ali ya minyatud a para kareng anak a lulub king 13 (o agpang keng lokal a kasuglung).

changes.title: Bayung babi
changes.body: Mimposta kami bayung update keni at baguhen ing ‚ÄòKaladwang me‚Äëupdate‚Äô a petsa.

intro.body: Kabud a gamit yu ing Chatforia, sumasang‚Äëayon kayu kareng Terms a ini. Nung ali, ali yu dapat gamit ing serbisyo.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Ibigay tamung tuparan a impormasyun at salikut deng kredensyal yu.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Responsable kayu king gagawan king account yu.

acceptableUse.title: Katanggap‚Äëtanggap a gamit
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ali dapat ilegal, abusadu, o mang‚Äëinfringe a laman; ali spam o automated a abuso.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Malyari ming i‚Äësuspend/terminate nung atin pamaglabag.

yourContent.title: Laman yu
yourContent.body: Kekayu pa rin deng karapatan keng laman yu. Ibigay yu kekami deng karapatang dapat para paandaran ing serbisyo (hal., routing, storage, translation).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Ing serbisyo atiu ‚Äòas is‚Äô alang warranty. Hanggang keng tutuking kapamilatan ning kasuglung, ali ya liable ing Chatforia kareng indirect o consequential a damyos.

changes.title: Bayung babi
changes.body: Malyari ming i‚Äëupdate deng terms; pamagpatul√Æ yu kaibat ning babi makayabey yang pamagtanggap.

doNotSell.title: Ali Benta o I‚Äëshare ing Personal Kung Impormasyun
doNotSell.body: Ali mibenta ing Chatforia personal a impormasyun. Pila kareng residente ning California makapag‚Äësubmit la pa ring request agpang CPRA gamit ing button king baba.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Dakal lang konti deng cookies a gamit ning Chatforia (hal., session, seguridad). Ali kami gumamit third‚Äëparty ads cookies. I‚Äëmanage yu deng cookies kapamilatan ning browser settings yu.
